document.full_text: the lakers' kobe bryant scored 17 points, all in the second half, but the hornets held on for a victory to even the best-of-seven series at two games apiece.
document.title: hornets 93, lakers 88: hornets hold off late lakers attack to even series
lines_and_colors: the lakers' kobe bryant scored 17 points, all in the second half, but the hornets held on for a victory to even the best-of-seven series at two games apiece.
